title: 103: Owning Your Wellness Story with Marni Wasserman and Jesse Chappus
itunes:title: 103: Owning Your Wellness Story with Marnie Wadderman and Jessie Chappus
description:
Have you ever made a major dietary shift but felt afraid to tell your community—especially because you wrote a book about your former way of eating?

That’s what happened to Marni of Ultimate Health Podcast and she had to come clean about her new way of eating, which made her feel better then ever before.

In this episode with her fiance chiropractor Jesse Chappus, we discuss:
-The health + wellness trends the Ultimate Health Podcast Duo has seen
-Why self-care is the new paradigm of wellness
-Their pillars of health
-Coming clean about changing the way you’ve eaten (and promoted)
-Authenticity in the wellness space

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Receive 15% off Four Sigmatic at foursigmatic.com with code "sahara"

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
